task.title: Generating a report of the meeting
task.shortdesc: You can generate a summary or detailed report for a meetings that you are the owner.

taskbody.context: The Summary and Full reports are available after the meeting ends. For information about what is contained in these reports, see .

step.cmd: From the Meeting Home, click Recent.
Next to the meeting to view reports for, tap the menu icon () for that meeting.
Select Meeting reports and then select the type of report to view.
Using the task bar at the top of the window, you can print and download the report.
step.info: The report opens in a new window as a PDF and is downloaded onto your device. The name of the report is meeting_name_ date_report_type_number.

step.cmd: Close the window to close the report. The report is not saved when closed.
